arealeveltext: Wisconsin absentee ballots are returned to Municipal Clerks, not at the county level. The SHOW DROP-OFF OPTIONS button will take you to a state-level search to find your Municipal Clerkâ€™s office, where your ballot can be hand delivered. Your ballot can also be dropped at your polling place on Election Day. City of Eau Claire ballot dropoff locations can be found here: https://www.eauclairewi.gov/government/our-divisions/elections
